name: Fruity Smoothie
description: Fruity Smoothie is a co-op game where you grow, throw and shoot fruit all to save your fruit family from evil fruit and vegetables with an identity crisis. So get a friend and get ready to make some smoothies!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32/64 bit Processor: i3-4130 or equivalant Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 4000 or equivalant DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space
